pullrequest.title: Reset joint positions after harnessing (all except the torso joints)

content.raw: @chapulina This could be a good time for `/ihmc_ros/localization/pelvis_pose_correction` or `/ihmc_ros/localization/pelvis_odom_pose_correction`.  You've got the Gazebo ground truth for the pelvis pose; could publish something during reharness to correct the pelvis pose, which will hopefully help with this.
content.html: @chapulina This could be a good time for /ihmc_ros/localization/pelvis_pose_correction or /ihmc_ros/localization/pelvis_odom_pose_correction. You've got the Gazebo ground truth for the pelvis pose; could publish something during reharness to correct the pelvis pose, which will hopefully help with this.
